game.name: Truck Clash Duel
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In limited-round battles, drive your war machine and crush all! Truck Clash Duel is a fast-paced shooter for 2-player split-screen duels. Control your unique vehicle, build momentum with every kill, and crown the points champion!
game.shortDescriptionEn: In limited-round battles, drive your war machine and crush all! Truck Clash Duel is a fast-paced shooter for 2-player split-screen duels. Control your unique vehicle, build momentum with every kill, and crown the points champion!
